DOC.detailed_description: This randomize study investigate potential protective effect high dose atorvastatin pre-treatment patient stable coronary artery disease undergo percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) chronic statin therapy . Two arm : 1. atorvastatin pre-treatment group ( 80mg atorvastatin seven day ) 2. control group ( without atorvastatin pre-treatment , chronic statin treatment ) Primary endpoint : Periprocedural myocardial infarction measure troponin I level ( time frame 24 hour ) Secondary endpoint : Periprocedural myocardial infarction measure creatine kinase myocardial band ( time frame 24 hour )
